ygData.subject: Re: making female friends
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe its a guild thing, but on Tunare I have made many female friends, some who are females in RL and some who are males.  I even have one friend who is a
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe its a guild thing, but on Tunare I have made many female friends,
some who are females in RL and some who are males. I even have one
friend who is a super high level female druid who plays a woman so
convincingly, I forget he is really a Samuel. Still, the majority of
the people I have on my friend list are males and I am frequently the
only female in a group....it is interesting to note that I am usually
the group's leader by consent or default even if I don't invite all the
group members....do you think that is a female thing?

Heather/ Genneth
